com.communote.plugins.api.rest.v22.resource

Class ResourceHandlerHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.plugins.api.rest.v22.resource.ResourceHandlerHelper

  • public class ResourceHandlerHelper
extends Object
    The abstract ResourceHandler supplies general methods for REST-API used by the concrete resource handlers.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

        Parameters:

        pageMaxCount - max cound of elements in page
        numberOfElements - number of found elements

        Returns the name provider to use.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getUploadedAttachmentsFromSession

        public static Set<Long> getUploadedAttachmentsFromSession(javax.ws.rs.core.Request request,
                                                          String attribute)
        Returns a set with attachment IDs uploaded in the current session. The list stored in the session is identified by the value of the request parameter PARAM_ATTACHMENTS_SESSION_ID. If the parameter is not provided null is returned. If the list is not yet in the session it will be put there.
        Parameters:
        request - Request
        attribute - The attribute to use. If null, the attribute will be extracted from the request using PARAM_ATTACHMENTS_SESSION_ID
        Returns:
        the set with attachment IDs or null if the identifier is not one of the request parameters

      • instance

        public static ResourceHandlerHelper instance()
        Returns:
        instance of the ResourceHandlerHalper

      • removeUploadedAttachmentsFromSession

        public static void removeUploadedAttachmentsFromSession(javax.ws.rs.core.Request request,
                                                        String attribute)
        Removes the attachment IDs set from the current session.
        Parameters:
        request - Request
        attribute - The attribute to use. If null, the attribute will be extracted from the request using PARAM_ATTACHMENTS_SESSION_ID

      • getText

        protected <T> String getText(javax.ws.rs.core.Request request,
                             String messageKey,
                             Object... arguments)
        Get text of message key with consideration of locale and replace arguments
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of resource
        Parameters:
        request - Request
        messageKey - key of message
        arguments - elements witch should replace in message text
        Returns:
        text of messageKey
